@graph.name: Optizen AI
@graph.description: AI-powered Shopify optimization tool for collections, tag pages, product content, and SEO enhancement with automated content generation and variant management.

audience.audienceType: Shopify store owners, E-commerce managers, SEO specialists

@graph.name: How to Use Optizen AI for Shopify Optimization
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to install and use Optizen AI features for Shopify store optimization.

step.name: Install Optizen AI
step.text: Install Optizen AI via the Shopify app store. FREE and basic AI plans are immediately available.

step.name: Configure Settings
step.text: Access Optizen Settings to configure your optimization preferences and AI features.

step.name: Create Prompt Templates
step.text: Create and save custom prompt templates for consistent AI-generated content.

step.name: Optimize Content
step.text: Use AI features to update products, collections, tag pages, and image alt text.

step.name: Manage Collections and Tags
step.text: Import/export collections and tag pages, create sitemaps, and use smart tag filters.

mainEntity.name: What's the difference between Optizen AI plans?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen AI FREE and basic AI plans are immediately available after installation. Pro and Enterprise plans require additional installation procedures and offer advanced features like variant tagger and variant image thumbnail matcher.

mainEntity.name: How do I install Optizen AI Pro or Enterprise?

acceptedAnswer.text: Pro and Enterprise plans require specific installation procedures for collection, tag page, variant tagger and variant image thumbnail matcher features. Detailed installation guides are provided in the support documentation.

mainEntity.name: Can I import and export my collections and tag pages?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Optizen AI supports importing and exporting both Shopify collections and tag pages, allowing you to manage your content efficiently.
Smart Tag Filters is a feature that helps optimize tag page functionality and improve navigation for your Shopify store customers.

hasDefinedTerm.description: Intelligent filtering system for tag pages that improves user navigation

hasDefinedTerm.description: Feature that synchronizes content and settings across your Shopify store

hasDefinedTerm.description: Pre-configured AI prompts that can be saved and reused for consistent content generation
